title: Website Updates
content:
This just adds loads of stuff, such as:
- News updates.
- A new role 'Silencer'.
- Some re-work on some role icons.

Plans:
I plan to add images as the icons for the roles.

title: Full Update of Website
content:
The website if fully updated now, which contains:
- New Role Icons in the roles page.
- Added icons in the Mod Options tab for each role setting/option.

Please note that the icons used in the website WILL be different in the mod and will be updated, which means those icons are placeholders and just look prettier than what's currently in the mod.

title: Another Website Update
content:
This is the latest version of the website. It added the new roles from v2.1-r, a new features page which shows all the features the mod adds.
This will most likely update a week or two later than which v3.0-r fully releases.

Some of the stuff will be added to the website from the test version of 3.0, so it is a lot less when the full version releases in March.

Thanks for your support, it helps me to continue even when some stuff are making it harder to continue.
